detectors.description: TokenRecover.recoverERC20(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#646-648) ignores return value by IERC20(tokenAddress).transfer(owner(),tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#647)

DripCrowdsale.constructor(uint256,address,IERC20Burnable).rate (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#695) shadows:
	- DripCrowdsale.rate() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#717-719) (function)

DripCrowdsale.constructor(uint256,address,IERC20Burnable).wallet (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#695) shadows:
	- DripCrowdsale.wallet() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#713-715) (function)

DripCrowdsale.constructor(uint256,address,IERC20Burnable).token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#695) shadows:
	- DripCrowdsale.token() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#709-711) (function)

Reentrancy in DripCrowdsale.buyTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#725-739):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(beneficiary,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#734)
		- returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#456)
		- _token.safeTransfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#757)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#367)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _processPurchase(beneficiary,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#734)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#367)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokensPurchased(_msgSender(),beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#736)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [DripCrowdsale.buyTokens(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L725-L739):

	- [_processPurchase(beneficiary,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L734)
		- [returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L456)
		- [_token.safeTransfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L757)
		- [(success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L367)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [_processPurchase(beneficiary,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L734)
		- [(success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L367)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokensPurchased(_msgSender(),beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DripCrowdsale.sol#L736)
